website_summaries.verdict: Quality pellet stove that is strong, sturdy, and easy to set up and install from the get-go.
pros: Simple to use and maintain on a daily basis
Within 20 minutes of firing up in a 40 degree room, it was at 87 degrees
Starts working with just a push of a button
Very stylish and will enhance any room in the house
cons: Be aware this pellet stove needs some clearance and a non-combustible platform when you set it up
If power flickers or you hit the wrong button, it shuts down for 30 minutes

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE, did I say Very Nice Pellet Stove, once again Very Nice Pellet Stove
customer_reviews.text: I had it just over a week sitting it our patio, I had to make a 4 inch high tile base to sit it on in order to get the vent pipe above a white rock wall, anyway after the pre-work was done got the baby fired up and Wham-o, heat galore. works great, wife said it looks to nice for the enclosed patio, now she wants it in the living room. @#$^&*((&%, I may have to buy another just to keep my owner happy. *&^@#^%$#@, thanks for making such a great working pellet stove. The only problem so far has been the lack of flow of pellets on the ignition mode, will be addressing this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great pellet stove
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pellet stove. Works very well. a part did go out within first month of use but we called them and told them what it needed and they shipped the replacement right away. Definitely great customer service and they were friendly the whole time through the replacement process. New part we had no issues with so we are very happy so far with this stove.
customer_reviews.author: petrina fryer

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT ALREADY!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be brave enough to Amazon such a LARGE purchase. This company has held my hand through the process though! Our unit came with some paint rubbed off. They sent a can of matching paint for us to spray it. Perfect. You can hear the pellets drop in, but I guess I'm used to it now. So easy to clean. I guess I do wish the hopper was a bit bigger. The heat it puts out though is amazing! No regrets with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great brought my heating bill unbelievably from $350 a month ...

customer_reviews.title: (2015) used it all last winter was great. Very easy to start with just a push ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago, (2015) used it all last winter was great. Very easy to start with just a push of a button. Very happy like it better than the soap stone wood stove we had. I get up in the morning push the start button and within a couple minutes it has started - the blower also circulates the heat. We fill the hopper once in the morning and then again before going to bed. Just started it for this year to take the chill off in the morning still starts very easy - no issues. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: concerned client

customer_reviews.title: Great Pellet stove
customer_reviews.text: Not any time I recall that a product company personally called me advising of item shipped and a week later across the USA it arrived via large 18 wheeler unloaded and brought the pallet and pellet stove 200 ft down the driveway had me inspect crate for damage etc! Just recently installed swapping out the old one and my wife was exceedingly happy with the look put mostly how quiet the blowers were. Throws lots of heat and I like the fact the working parts are accessible from the hinged and heavy magnetic locking sides, god forbid something needs fixing it’s right there! Comfort built and subsidiaries I want to thank you and appreciate the extra steps you take! Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love this pellet stove! It was delivered within 2 weeks and was easy to install and use. This stove heats our 2500 Sq Ft house without us having to us having to use any other heating methods. It starts with a push of a button and is so quiet which was important to us. Our prior pellet stove sounded like a jet engine. We highly recommend this stove.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We've had the stove for a few months now and use it as our primary heat. We love it. We have a small house so it does sometimes get a bit warm in here but we shut it down for cleaning purposes daily so it adjusts. We bought rather expensive pellets because of their low ash rating and there is a lot of ash. We do not think it's the stove. We will try out duffernt pellets next year.
